title: Counter-Depth French Door Refrigerator | KitchenAid
description:
The new Counter-Depth French Door Refrigerator is the largest capacity Refrigerator in its class*. The under-shelf prep zone is equipped with an oven-safe pan, perfect for setting dough or marinating meats in your favorite recipes. Full extension drawers ensure you’re able to see all your ingredients easily. The FreshSeal™ Crispers maintain optimal humidity levels to provide the perfect climate for common fruits and vegetables. The Preserva® Food Care System helps keep your produce at peak freshness. Plus, with its stain resistant Platinum interior design and exterior PrintShield™ Finish that resists against smudges and fingerprints, this Refrigerator is sure to look beautiful from the inside out. And the Counter-Depth French Door Refrigerator operates quietly, giving you piece of mind to stay focused on your next creation.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of KitchenAid Counter-Depth French Door Refrigerators. Shop for KitchenAid Counter-Depth Refrigerators, as well as the full line of KitchenAid Appliances at Abt.

*Among leading 3-door counter depth French door bottom mount brands.
